channel.title: Starting up a new server!
channel.description:
Well im starting up a new server, and im in need of a Dev team, here is what im looking for,
2 server coders 2 client coders 1+ people to create and manage forums
IF and WHEN server takes off, if it does(dont expect it to) i will pay you if i can.
the server is currently running but with basic stuff, i have high hopes for my server and a lot of ideas,
this will be ECO server so no DONATER shops or stupid shops like that, all items can only be obtained by creating eg skilling, or drops eg killign monsters!

item.title: Starting up a new server!
item.dc:creator: @xFaceless xFaceless
item.description:
@xFaceless wrote:

I can work forums. Send me a message

Read full topic
